Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.predicates

This package contains all the predicates that may appear in proof specifications.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CLPredicate This predicate expresses proofs of knowledge about credentials.
CommitmentPredicate This predicate expresses proofs about external commitments that use the bases from the issuer public key under which the proof is created.
DomainNymPredicate This predicate proves knowledge of a domain pseudonym.
InequalityPredicate  
MessagePredicate Predicate to indicate that one or more messages must be signed as a part of the proof.
Predicate Abstract class to inherited by the various predicate types.
PrimeEncodePredicate This predicate expresses proofs on prime encoded attributes.
PseudonymPredicate Predicate for proving a domain pseudonym.
RepresentationPredicate Predicate to prove knowledge of a representation.
VerEncPredicate Predicate to prove knowledge of a verifiable encryption.
 

Enum Summary
InequalityPredicate.InequalityOperator Operators for inequality proofs.
InequalityPredicate.InequalityType Define whether the inequality is over another attribute or a constant.
Predicate.PredicateType Defines the different predicates.
PrimeEncodePredicate.PrimeEncodeOp Operators for prime encoded attributes.
 

Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.predicates Description

This package contains all the predicates that may appear in proof specifications. Those predicates define the proof that is to be generated.

See Also:
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof, com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.ip, com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.pe
